titles.title: Economic Stimulus for Rural Communities Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide an incentive for expanding employment in rural areas by allowing employers the work opportunity credit for hiring residents of rural areas.
Economic Stimulus for Rural Communities Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Economic Stimulus for Rural Communities Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an employer to claim a work opportunity tax credit during the next five years for the hiring of employees who live in a rural area and perform services for such employer in a rural area.
